help-file.title: REMORT ASCEND
help-file.content:
The <ascend/remort> command is available to Paladins and Evil Necromancers once they have gained their 50th level. They spend 50 epic points to become a new class (and race for necromancers) at the spec teacher for their class.
Remort'ed characters retain their pre-remorted character statistics, but all previous choices the mortal has made are unraveled, allowing them to choose a new specialization of their liking.
At the necromancer specialist teacher, evils are able to use the <remort> command to transform themselves into a Vampire Dreadlord. At the paladin specialist teacher, goodies are able to use the <ascend> command to transform themselves into an Avenger.
